response:
### 🧵 Blue Fabric Options

We've got 24 stunning blue fabrics across our collections. Grouped by tier for easy browsing (prices shown are add-ons to base sofa/bed costs). Swatches available online!

#### Essentials (Included in base price)
- **Clever Cotton Mix - Oxford Blue**: Stain-resistant plain weave (52% Polyester, 48% Cotton). Soft & practical for everyday use.  
  [View Swatch](https://sofasandstuff.com/images/thumbs/0010958_clever-cotton-mix-oxford-blue.jpeg)

#### Exclusives (Premium: +£200-400)
- **Almost Plain Velvet - Powder Blue**: Sumptuous short-pile with dappled effect (100% Polyester). Luxe feel!  
  [View Swatch](https://sofasandstuff.com/images/thumbs/0038781_almost-plain-velvet-powder-blue.jpeg)
- **Cloth 22 Racing Stripes - Blueberry**: Bold vintage stripes. Timeless & fun.  
  [View Swatch](https://sofasandstuff.com/images/thumbs/0023921_cloth-22-racing-stripes-cheltenham-blueberry.jpeg)
- **Craster - Blue Basil**: Subtle diamond weave (linen/cotton blend). Relaxed texture.  
  [View Swatch](https://sofasandstuff.com/images/thumbs/0038880_craster-blue-basil.jpeg)
- **Etta's Stripe - Powder Blue**: Narrow monotone stripes (67% Viscose, 33% Linen). Versatile pattern.  
  [View Swatch](https://sofasandstuff.com/images/thumbs/0037928_ettas-stripe-powder-blue.jpeg)
- **Grain Sack Stripe Linen - Blue**: Eco-friendly 100% linen stripes. Elegant & natural.  
  [View Swatch](https://sofasandstuff.com/images/thumbs/0028815_grain-sack-stripe-linen-blue.jpeg)
- **Padua Pavement - Marine Blue**: Subtle circular jacquard print. Refined & historic.  
  [View Swatch](https://sofasandstuff.com/images/thumbs/0039059_padua-pavement-marine-blue.jpeg)
- **RHS Gertrude Jekyll Lattice - Blue**: Geometric from RHS archives. Botanical charm.  
  [View Swatch](https://sofasandstuff.com/images/thumbs/0027454_rhs-collection-gertrude-jekyll-lattice-blue.jpeg)
- **Roxburgh Herringbone - Blue Basil**: Striped herringbone weave. Durable & organic.  
  [View Swatch](https://sofasandstuff.com/images/thumbs/0038888_roxburgh-herringbone-blue-basil.jpeg)
- **V&A Brompton Ikat - Midnight Blue**: Elegant ikat-style stripes. Understated luxury.  
  [View Swatch](https://sofasandstuff.com/images/thumbs/0022320_va-brompton-collection-ikat-midnight-blue.jpeg)
- **V&A Brompton Ikat - Morning Blue**: Soft ikat check design. Timeless.  
  [View Swatch](https://sofasandstuff.com/images/thumbs/0022318_va-brompton-collection-ikat-morning-blue.jpeg)
- **V&A Threads Velvets - Andhra Weave Powder Blue**: Ikat-inspired printed velvet. Vibrant craft.  
  [View Swatch](https://sofasandstuff.com/images/thumbs/0034995_va-threads-of-india-opulent-velvets-andhra-weave-powder-blue.jpeg)
- **V&A Threads Velvets - Ikat Mirage Powder Blue**: Colorful mashru technique. Artistic.  
  [View Swatch](https://sofasandstuff.com/images/thumbs/0035061_va-threads-of-india-opulent-velvets-ikat-mirage-powder-blue.jpeg)
- **V&A Threads Velvets - Paisley Splendour Powder Blue**: Kashmir paisley motifs. Exquisite.  
  [View Swatch](https://sofasandstuff.com/images/thumbs/0040276_va-threads-of-india-opulent-velvets-paisley-splendour-powder-blue.jpeg)
- **Woven Linen Stripes (Askrigg/Baldersby/Carthorpe/Ganton/Hovingham - Blue)**: Classic 100% linen stripes. Adaptable & natural.  
  [View Swatches](https://sofasandstuff.com/images/thumbs/0025838_askrigg-woven-linen-stripe-blue.jpeg) (and similar)

#### Signature (Luxury: +£400-800)
- **Harris Tweed - Blue**: Handwoven 100% virgin wool from Outer Hebrides. Authentic heritage.  
  [View Swatch](https://sofasandstuff.com/images/thumbs/0028823_harris-tweed-blue.jpeg)
- **Harris Tweed - Midnight Blue**: Rich, deep wool weave. Premium durability.  
  [View Swatch](https://sofasandstuff.com/images/thumbs/0026472_harris-tweed-house-midnight-blue.jpeg)

#### V&A (Luxury: +£400-800)
- **Threads on Linen - Ikat Mirage Mineral Blue**: Vibrant palampore patterns on linen. Exotic.  
  [View Swatch](https://sofasandstuff.com/images/thumbs/0038916_va-threads-of-india-on-linen-ikat-mirage-mineral-blue.jpeg)
- **Threads on Linen - Ikat Mirage Venetian Blue**: Bold ikat on linen base. Striking.  
  [View Swatch](https://sofasandstuff.com/images/thumbs/0038914_va-threads-of-india-on-linen-ikat-mirage-venetian-blue.jpeg)
- **Threads on Linen - Tree of Life Mineral Blue**: 18th-century inspired chintz. Blended motifs.  
  [View Swatch](https://sofasandstuff.com/images/thumbs/0038931_va-threads-of-india-on-linen-tree-of-life-mineral-blue.jpeg)

### ✨ Key Features
• All fabrics suit our hardwood frames (lifetime guarantee) & duck feather cushions  
• Handmade in UK; 8-12 week delivery  
• Stain-resistant options in Essentials; opulent textures in Luxury  

### 🎯 Opportunities to Enhance
> **Pair with Alwinton sofa** - From £1,295 in blue Essentials  
> **Upgrade to Luxury tier** - Adds £400-800 for Harris Tweed elegance  
> **Add scatter cushions** - From £45 each in matching blue  

### 💬 What would you like to know next?
- Price Alwinton in Oxford Blue  
- Show sofas under £2000  
- Compare blue velvet options  
- See grey fabrics instead
